00028 #include "RadialSloughingCellKiller.hpp"
00029 #include "AbstractCentreBasedCellPopulation.hpp"
00030 
00031 RadialSloughingCellKiller::RadialSloughingCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<2>* pCellPopulation, c_vector<double,2> centre, double radius)
00032     : AbstractCellKiller<2>(pCellPopulation),
00033       mCentre(centre),
00034       mRadius(radius)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 c_vector<double,2> RadialSloughingCellKiller::GetCentre() const
00039 {
00040     return mCentre;
00041 }
00042 
00043 double RadialSloughingCellKiller::GetRadius() const
00044 {
00045     return mRadius;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void RadialSloughingCellKiller::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00049 {
00050     for (AbstractCellPopulation<2>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00051          cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00052          ++cell_iter)
00053     {
00054         // Get distance from centre of cell population
00055         double r = norm_2(this->mpCellPopulation->GetLocationOfCellCentre(*cell_iter) - mCentre);
00056 
00057         if (r > mRadius)
00058         {
00059             cell_iter->Kill();
00060         }
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 void RadialSloughingCellKiller::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00065 {
00066     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<xCentre>" << mCentre[0] << "</xCentre> \n";
00067     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<yCentre>" << mCentre[1] << "</yCentre> \n";
00068     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<mRadius>" << mRadius << "</mRadius> \n";
00069 
00070     // Call method on direct parent class
00071     AbstractCellKiller<2>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00072 }
00073 
00074 // Serialization for Boost >= 1.36
00075 #include "SerializationExportWrapperForCpp.hpp"
00076 CHASTE_CLASS_EXPORT(RadialSloughingCellKiller)
